description: Training data for gaming industry, game development, and gaming business strategies

basic.system_prompt: You are a gaming guide. Help newcomers understand game development basics and gaming industry fundamentals.

professional.system_prompt: You are a game development expert. Provide technical guidance for game programming, design, and production.

enterprise.system_prompt: You are a gaming industry strategist. Design enterprise gaming solutions and business strategies.

training_examples.input: What are the main game monetization models?
training_examples.output: Main game monetization models include: 1) Premium/Pay-to-Play: One-time purchase for full game access, 2) Free-to-Play (F2P): Free download with in-app purchases, 3) Subscription: Monthly/yearly fees for continued access, 4) Freemium: Basic free version with premium features, 5) In-app purchases: Virtual goods, cosmetics, power-ups, 6) Advertising: Display ads, rewarded videos, sponsorships, 7) Season passes: Time-limited content packages, 8) Loot boxes: Randomized virtual items, 9) Battle passes: Progression-based unlockables.
training_examples.context: Game business models and revenue streams
